title: Changing service to google workspace. Want to migrate emails from old mail in thunderbird (POP3) to google (IMAP) with the same address
content: I already migrate my email service to google workspace with the same email address and domain. The old mail still on the thunderbird (POP3). title: Thunderbird 115.9.0 (64-bit) HTML Signature
content:
Hi Everyone,

I am trying to add a HTML signature to my emails and added it to the HTML box in account settings. I then go to my emails to check that the signature looks ok, so open an email and and my signature flashes up then disappears. I sent the email just to make sure and there is no signature. Does anyone one have any ideas why this might be happening. It worked fine at the start, but then this keeps happening.
creator: rainer3369

title: Drag and drop emails on local drive folder
content: Hello, It's there any option/setting in mozilla thunderbird for drag and drop emails to local drive folder and save them under another filename that the standard "Subject" name? I don't know if i'm clearly enough, that's why i want to make a briefly description of the operation i want and the way the emails i want to appear in my folder. I drag and drop an email to my folder and this email has the filename represented by the "Subject" of that email. Can i change the way emails are saved ? Or can i drag and drop emails from one sender in separate folder ?
creator: gugalmailaidi
